## ICobuildLockProvider.connectAsync() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The callback function invoked to connect to the lock provider. For example, initializing the connection to the redis server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
connectAsync(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
